reference.shortdesc: The glossarylist element either references a topic that contains a list of glossary entries in the book, or it indicates to a processor that a list of glossary entries should be generated at this location in the book.

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: For the glossarylist element, a processor could generate a list of glossary entries used in the book.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The glossarylist element is specialized from topicref. It is defined in the bookmap module.
